title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Whenever a working set is removed, the changes take effect immediately without any prompt or confirmation.
OB:
1. Create a working set that includes one project and select it. The package view is filtered accordingly.
2.
EB: The working set is removed and the package view is no longer filtered.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Remove the working set.
3. Observe that the package view is no longer filtered.
